name: Lukas Eipert
body:
### About me
Currently studying Computer Science at [Universit√§t Leipzig](http://uni-leipzig.de) I share a great interest in Web Development (PHP, JS, HTML). Recently I started focusing on AngularJS and Laravel 4.

Beside my involvement with Web Development I maintain Windows Servers and Debian Webservers.

### Repositories
Just have a look at @leipert or one of the following I contributed to:
* [leipert/xkcd-now-clock](https://github.com/leipert/xkcd-now-clock)
* [swp14-gsb/gsb](https://swp14-gsb.github.io/)
* [gehaxelt/PHP-Webopal](https://github.com/gehaxelt/PHP-Webopal)

### Websites:

* [druglab118.com](http://druglab118.com)
* [cornelia-hudl.de](http://cornelia-hudl.de)
* [mcredo.de](http://mcredo.de)
* [lextum.de](http://lextum.de)
